Sharing Personal Information with Third Parties
This document outlines how Mentoga ("Mentoga," "we," "our," or "us") collects, uses, stores, and protects personal information.
We may share your Personal Data with third parties that help us provide the messaging service, including, but not limited to, platform providers, phone companies, and other vendors who assist us in the delivery of text messages.
In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, personal data may be transferred to the acquiring entity.

Mentoga collects personal information directly from users, automatically through usage of the Site, and from third-party sources.
